implicitPoint3D_LPI(p1:l1x;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;l1y;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;l1z;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;d1;3;192;4.886390771174922e-015;6.000000000000006)
implicitPoint3D_LPI(p2:l2x;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;l2y;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;l2z;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;d2;3;192;4.886390771174922e-015;6.000000000000006)

px py pz
qx qy qz

d1px = d1 * px
d1py = d1 * py
d1pz = d1 * pz
d1qx = d1 * qx
d1qy = d1 * qy
d1qz = d1 * qz

d2px = d2 * px
d2py = d2 * py
d2pz = d2 * pz
d2qx = d2 * qx
d2qy = d2 * qy
d2qz = d2 * qz

v1x = d1px - l1x
v1y = d1py - l1y
v1z = d1pz - l1z
v2x = d2px - l2x
v2y = d2py - l2y
v2z = d2pz - l2z
v3x = d1qx - l1x
v3y = d1qy - l1y
v3z = d1qz - l1z
v4x = d2qx - l2x
v4y = d2qy - l2y
v4z = d2qz - l2z

c1x1 = v1y * v2z
c1x2 = v1z * v2y
c1x = c1x1 - c1x2
c1y1 = v1z * v2x
c1y2 = v1x * v2z
c1y = c1y1 - c1y2
c1z1 = v1x * v2y
c1z2 = v1y * v2x
c1z = c1z1 - c1z2

c2x1 = v3y * v4z
c2x2 = v3z * v4y
c2x = c2x1 - c2x2
c2y1 = v3z * v4x
c2y2 = v3x * v4z
c2y = c2y1 - c2y2
c2z1 = v3x * v4y
c2z2 = v3y * v4x
c2z = c2z1 - c2z2

dpx = c1x * c2x
dpy = c1y * c2y
dpz = c1z * c2z
dpxy = dpx + dpy
dp = dpxy + dpz
